generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, extending into the distance and curving to the right.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible along the edge of the road, bordered by a curb and some vegetation.
- building: Several multi-story buildings with windows and architectural details are visible in the background.
- vegetation: Trees and shrubs are present along the roadside and in the median.
- terrain: Grass and soil are visible in the median and along the sidewalk.
- person: A group of people can be seen standing on the sidewalk near the crosswalk.
- traffic sign: Road signs indicating directions to "Nancy-Metz Haguenau," "Porte Blanche," and "Petite France" are visible.
- pole: Traffic light poles and sign poles are visible in the scene.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible at the intersection, showing red.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is visible parked on the left side of the street.
